definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
to serve as/to act as/to play the role of
to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
to be full of/to flood/to congest
to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as

sentences.english: Find ways to relax and recharge your batteries.
sentences.chinese: 想办法让自己轻松一点并适时的充充电。

sentences.english: Please add 50 yuan into my card.
In the paper, the alternative characters of current electric conduction of rock-coal porous medium with gas are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了煤岩多孔介质及其充瓦斯后的交流导电性。
我们必须重新充充电了。

sentences.english: Shenzhen is a city of the sun filled hang.
sentences.chinese: 深圳是一个阳光充沆的城市。

sentences.english: Finally the various applications of TPU coated fabric in inflatable materials were concluded.
sentences.chinese: 总结了TPU胶布在各种充气囊体材料中的应用。

sentences.english: P: Please add 50 yuan into my card.

sentences.chinese: 请你把电池充一下电好吗？

sentences.english: They imposed a false article upon him as genuine.
sentences.chinese: 他们以假货充真货硬塞给他。

sentences.english: Will you please have the battery charged?
sentences.chinese: 请你将电池充一下电好吗？

sentences.english: Trasmission properties of symmetrically guided modes excited by a spherically symmetrical impulsive point source in fluid-filled tube are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了充流体管中由点源激发的对称模式弹性波。

sentences.english: Be the best of you, not better than you.
sentences.chinese: 呈现你最美好的一面，但不需打肿脸皮充胖子。

sentences.english: The lamps of the gallery were full of gaseous neon, which made the light colorful.
sentences.chinese: 画廊的灯泡都充了气态的氖，这使得灯光五颜六色。

sentences.english: Disconnect plug connection for bonnet wire harness in plenum panel on right.
sentences.chinese: 断开右侧充压板中发动机罩线束的插头。

sentences.english: Let oneself every day was honest, such ability can not regret it.
sentences.chinese: 让自己的每一天都充充实实的，这样才会不留下遗憾。
